questions: Who are the head and secretaries of Academic Affairs (VPAA)?
Head and Secretary of Academic Affairs?
What are the names of the head and secretaries of Academic Affairs?
answers: Mrs. Liza Ilagan, Mrs. Nordie Pineda, and Mrs. Corazon Valencia.
They are Mrs. Liza Ilagan, Mrs. Nordie Pineda, and Mrs. Corazon Valencia.
